action.name: Execute
action.execute: /usr/bin/xlock -remote -nice 19 -mode marquee -message "$LOGNAME will be back in the morning."

action.name: Execute
action.execute: /usr/bin/xlock -remote -nice 19 -mode marquee -message "$LOGNAME not here, please go away!"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: /usr/bin/xlock -remote -nice 19 -mode nose -message "$LOGNAME will be back in the morning."

action.name: Execute
action.execute: /usr/bin/xlock -remote -nice 19 -mode nose -message "$LOGNAME not here, please go away!"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: /usr/bin/xlock -remote -nice 19 -mode xjack -message "All work and no play makes $LOGNAME a dull boy."

action.name: Execute
action.execute: /usr/bin/xlock -remote -nice 19 -mode xjack -message "All work and no play makes $LOGNAME a dull girl."
